title: PD or Statick shiv
body: So ever since I've been playing Yasuo I always wondered which is better for Yasuo {{item:3046}}  or {{item:3087}}  which one is better and why? and while ur at it could u guys tell me which is the best skin for yas?

replies.body:
Well you already have a shield. If you're at the point where you're telling yourself, "boy I really need another shield, in exchange for 10% AS," you're already too far behind for PD's shield to matter. 

Shiv is more AS and gives extra damage too. 

Before the changes, people were bringing PD because it had better stats. Not really for the damage reduction. But now it doesn't.

High noon is the best. Nothin' beats a gunsword.

Shiv has more damage and wave clear while Pd has more survivablity. Most yas players go Shiv.
Personally I like odyssey and default the best
